001package org.relationlearn.filters;
002
003import weka.core.Attribute;
004import weka.core.FastVector;
005import weka.core.Instance;
006import weka.core.Instances;
007
008/**
009 * The FilterGroup interface defines a container for an undefined amount of
010 * TextFilters allowing the generation of weka 
011 * {@link weka.core.Instance Instance} objects with as many
012 * attributes as the number of TextFilter objects present in the group.
013 * 
014 * @see TextFilter
015 * @see weka.core.Instance
016 */
017public interface FilterGroup {
018    
019    /**
020     * Returns the dataset name for this FilterGroup.
021     * 
022     * @return the dataset name of this FilterGroup
023     */
024    public String getGroupDatasetName();
025    
026    /**
027     * Returns the current dataset for this FilterGroup.
028     * 
029     * @return the dataset for this FilterGroup
030     */
031    public Instances getGroupDataset();
032    
033    /**
034     * Returns a FastVector instance containing all the Attribute elements
035     * of this FilterGroup, this Attribute elements are the one's each Instace
036     * generated with the method createInstanceUsingFilters must have.
037     * 
038     * @return a FastVector containing all the attributes of the FilterGroup
039     * 
040     * @see weka.core.Attribute
041     * @see weka.core.FastVector
042     */
043    public FastVector getGroupAttributes();
044    
045    /**
046     * Generates an Instance object by applying all the TextFilter elements
047     * contained in the FilterGroup to the input parameters provided.
048     * 
049     * @param r Response text in the argumentation
050     * @param h Hypothesis text in the argumentation
051     * @return an Instance with one Attribute for each TextFilter in the
052     * FilterGroup
053     * 
054     * @see weka.core.Instance
055     */
056    public Instance createInstanceUsingFilters(String r, String h);
057    
058    /**
059     * Adds a new TextFilter to the FilterGroup.
060     * 
061     * @param filter the TextFilter to be added to this FilterGroup
062     * 
063     * @see TextFilter
064     */
065    public void addFilter(TextFilter filter);
066    
067    /**
068     * Adds the Attribute that corresponds to the class of this FilterGroup
069     * generated Instances
070     * 
071     * @param attr the weka Attribute that will be the class of the Instances
072     */
073    public void addClassAttribute(Attribute attr);
074
075}
